translation: true words of the Sanskrit phoneme thousand-armed kuṇḍalī
The true saying of the thousand-armed kuṇḍalī is.

source_sentence: 梵書千臂軍荼利陀羅尼
translation: Dhāraṇī of the Brahmā's Thousand-armed Kuṇḍalī

source_sentence: 大唐青龍寺東塔院內供奉傳法灌頂故大阿闍梨義操梵書記
translation: Formerly the Great Ajātaśatru Yixias Brahmā's Record of Making Offerings to the Dharma Consecration inside the East Pagoda of the Great Tang Temple of Qinglong Monastery
